org.princehouse.mica.lib.abstractions
Class MergeCorrelated

java.lang.Object
  org.princehouse.mica.base.BaseProtocol
      org.princehouse.mica.lib.abstractions.MergeCorrelated
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Protocol
Direct Known Subclasses:
DemoCompositeProtocol
public class MergeCorrelated
extends BaseProtocol

Merge two protocols in such a way that the composite protocol gossips both subprotocols to the same target peer as frequently as possible, while still respecting individual address distributions. NOTE: This is called "general merge" in the MiCA paper.

Author:
lonnie
See Also:
Serialized Form
